Rating, 5 stars,  路 March 2024,  路 Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: The location was good . Host was super cooperative.

info: Rating, 1 star,  路 January 2024,  路 Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Someone has visited our room during our stay while we are away.
I have noticed that some stuff are in the fridge when we have moved in, but on the other day those stuffs were gone which indicates that someone has visited while we were away
For your information, the visitor has no intention for cleaning as the house is left unclean.
If someone wants to take their stuff from the fridge then the appropriate way would be to let us know in advance and seek permission
I am totally unsatisfied about this incident
Thats the sole reason I did not check in for the second booking.
I have thoroughly explained about this whole incident however, Mr.Udoy did not even bother to apologise for his or his staffs unprofessionalism.
P.S. I did not requested the refund. I do not want the refund for the second booking. But I do require a sincere apologies from Mr.Udoy and I would like to request Airbnb to take this matter seriously.
I have proof that all of us are away on that day.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 May 2023,  路 Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Very convenient place. Everything was of top standard. The house is clean and well maintained. Finding nice local food was easy especially at night whenever i craved for great Bengali cha and chicken soup. Our request to fix electricity blackout issues were rectified immediately.

rating_comment: It's a great combination of price, convenience, and comfort living! Calm and quiet neighborhood, very supportive host, and hassle-free stay. We did enjoy our time over there. I will recommend others to consider this place. Thank you, Mr.Udoy.

info: Rating, 1 star,  路 December 2021,  路 Stayed over a week
rating_comment: I don't know how this house get wristband. Airbnb should look into it. It's the worst house I've ever rented on Airbnb. The owner is very rude, house is full of rats, door knobs does not works, rest room flushes does not work, everything is so filthy. The owner does not know what is the true meaning of customer care. He told me he does not care about money. My question is then why your house is on Airbnb. In the ground floor of the house, it has an explosive chemical storage, which is very risky. I rented the house for a month. It was a total disappointment. Rent is very high. I wouldn't mind the rent if it were good. Unfortunately, it was the worst experience ever.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 September 2021,  路 Stayed a few nights

info: Rating, 4 stars,  路 September 2021,  路 Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: The place is very nice. However, price seems to be a bit high, as there are certain repairs that need done, specially in the bathroom. But overall, happy with the short stay. Close to everything (mosques, cafes, restaurants, etc).
